LocoIsland T-shirt (women's)
kDesc
This t-shirt features a beautiful print of Loco Island. Blue skies! Open sea! Striking horizon! Wear this and everyday will be a holiday!
Ce t-shirt est doté d'une magnifique image de l'île Loco. Ciel bleu ! Haute mer ! Horizon saisissant ! Porte-le et chaque jour ressemblera à des vacances !
Das T-Shirt zeigt einen wunderschönen Druck von der Loco-Insel. Blauer Himmel! Offenes Meer! Atemberaubender Horizont! Damit fühlt sich jeder Tag wie Urlaub an!
Questa t-shirt presenta una meravigliosa stampa di Loco Island. Cielo azzurro! Mare aperto! Vista spettacolare! Indossala, e ogni giorno sarà vacanza!
Esta camiseta presenta una hermosa imagen de la Loco Isla. ¡El cielo azul! ¡El mar abierto! ¡El impresionante horizonte! ¡Ponte esto y todos los días serán vacaciones!
ロコアイランドを鮮やかにプリントしたＴシャツ。 青い空！綺麗な海！ドーンと広がる地平線！これを着ればいつでも南国気分！
로코 아일랜드를 멋지게 인쇄한 T셔츠. 푸른 하늘! 드넓은 바다! 길게 뻗은 수평선! 이것만 입으면 언제나 바캉스 기분!
This t-shirt features a beautiful print of Loco Island. Blue skies! Open sea! Striking horizon! Wear this and everyday will be a holiday!
將樂克島嶼印製得很鮮艷的Ｔ恤。蔚藍的天空！美麗的海洋！一望無際的水平線！穿上它就可以隨時享受南國氣氛！
將樂克島嶼印製得很鮮艷的Ｔ恤。蔚藍的天空！美麗的海洋！一望無際的水平線！穿上它就可以隨時享受南國氣氛！
This t-shirt features a beautiful print of LocoIsland. Blue skies! Open sea! Striking horizon! Wear this and everyday will be a holiday!
